data.text:
Every year i visit Dubai and i have seen alot of different hotels, but this hotel is something else. The view is fenomenal, the service is very good and the rooms are very clean. Especially Taufeq was very nice. 
For now on we will always book this hotel. 
Rigga Road is like 10 mins walking, Goldsouq also and you can go with the boat to the other side for a very good coffee (Al Seef). 
Thank you for this nice experiance Carlton Hotel!  
And don't forget to book a room on Creek side otherwise you will look into a street and parkingðŸ˜…
data.title: Best hotel in Deira!

data.text: This was our second visir to Dubai, when our main focus was to attend COP28. In one word the hotel experience was wonderful. The lady at the front desk was simply superb. She was extremely helpful and friendly. Helped us immensely whenever we asked for it. The room was spacious and clean, we received an upgrade!! The breakfast  was good with outstansing location and view. The hotel is close to metro so that was an added advantage. Overall the experience was excellent.
data.title: Outstanding hotel with impecable service !!!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tahmina,
Thank you for recommending Carlton Dubai Creek Hotel after the experience you had with us! We are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience at Carlton Dubai Creek Hotel and that you enjoyed the experience and the professional service of our front desk. Our team would like to express our gratitude for your positive comments, and we would love to have the chance to welcome you back in the nearest future.

Kind Regards
Vidya Adams
Cluster Director of Operations
owner_response.author: Vidya adams

data.text: Strange start as a couple were being charged for a stain on a towel. Quite a fuss being made about this in reception. We were pleased to be given an upgrade to a suite (think that is all that is available) but the first thing we did was check the towels!!  Staff were very helpful and attentive. Room was lovely with a great view of the creek. The area is not great and we felt a single woman might feel ill at ease walking around here. The hotel is near the gold and spice souks and the metro which we found very easy to use. We ate in the restaurant once for dinner - the buffet one was closed and in the hotel area we could not find any decent eateries. We were amazed that there was only one type of beer on offer from a list of about 6 or more. The waiter did not understand our questions about the menu and had to get the manager. Main course was delicious. Decided to have a dessert - only one was available out of the list. Bit of a poor show for a 4 star hotel. But breakfast was the biggest disappointment. So little choice. The egg station chef would not cook poached eggs - took too long and he had no vinegar!! Only filter coffee available and that was pretty weak. There was no fresh bread on one morning and that morning the pastries and rolls were stale. One day there was no orange juice. Room was quiet.
data.title: Disappointing

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
We would like to thank you for taking the time to offer us your honest feedback. First of all, we would like to thank you for your positive comments about our room, coffee, staff and view. It is with concern that we find out that you weren't fully satisfied with the breakfast. Your feedback is very much appreciated and has been communicated to the relevant departments. All your remarks are taken into consideration to improve our hotel. We wish you could give us another chance to win you back.
Kind Regards,
Vidya Adams
Cluster Director of Operations
owner_response.author: Vidya adams

data.text: Thank you for helping us to have the best 2-night stay in Dubai. From the check in with Beni to our departure with Zahur, everything was perfect. We dined at your Lebanese restaurant, swam in your pool and enjoyed the view of Dubai Creek during our stay. Beni understood it was our first time in Dubai and looked after us meticulously. She was such a blessing! Also, when we checked out, Zahur helped us ordering our 2nd ever Uber ride and stayed with us until our luggage were in the vehicle. We felt like royalty! We recommend this location as it perfect if you want to visit Bur Dubai, Deira and learn all about the formation of Dubai.
data.title: Great location to learn the history of the growth of Dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Let us thank you for recommending Carlton Dubai Creek Hotel after the experience you had with us! Our team is happy to note that you enjoyed our convenient location and unique view. We would love to welcome you back in the nearest future.
Kind Regards,
Vidya Adams

owner_response.author: Vidya adams

data.text: I was at coffee shop and I had an order for coffee after a tiresome day and coffee and place was totally mind blowing. I must appreciate the professionalism of indah in coffee shop she is totally an asset for company. 10/10 score
data.title: Great experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

At Carlton Dubai Creek Hotel our goal is to meet and exceed our guests' expectations. I am delighted to know that we have delivered true hospitality to you. Your feedback has been communicated to our team member and she is delighted! 

We value your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Kind Regards, 
Vidya Adams
Cluster Director of Operations
owner_response.author: Vidya adams
